maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Envoy of change...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Émissaire du changement...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...with the endurance of a flowing river...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... avec l'endurance du fleuve qui s'écoule...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ... with the agility of a gust of wind....
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... avec l'agilité d'une bourrasque de vent...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...you shall reach your destination.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... vous atteindrez votre destination.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Envoy of change...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Émissaire du changement...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...with the strength of a burning sun...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... avec la force d'un soleil brulant...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ... with the resilience of a solid mountain...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... avec la résistance d'une montagne solide...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...you shall reach your destination.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... vous atteindrez votre destination.
... Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Spheromancer Lea!\. You finally arrived!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Spheromancer Lea !\. Enfin vous êtes arrivée !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: As it turns out your \c[1]ridiculous damage\c[0] doesn't help you solve puzzles any faster!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et on dirait que vos \c[1]dégâts ridiculement élevés\c[0] ne vous ont pas aidé à résoudre les puzzles plus rapidement !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: In the end, both Spheromancers came in first! Exactly how it was meant to be!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et au final, les deux Spheromancers arrivèrent en premier ! Exactement comme il se doit !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Damn it!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon sang !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: See, Pentafist?\. In the end-
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tu vois, Pentafist ?\. Au final-

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oui, oui, Spheromancers rule. Blah, blah.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, oui, les Spheromancers sont trop géniaux, Bla, bla, bla.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I get it, Grasshead.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: J'ai compris, Tête d'Herbe.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You win this time, this doesn't mean anything!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tu as gagné cette fois, mais ça ne veut rien dire !
... Salut...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Spheromancer Lea! We've been waiting for you!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Spheromancer Lea ! Nous t'attendions !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Hah...\. at least I wasn't last.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Hah...\. au moins je n'étais dernière.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Yes, Grasshead was here first.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, Tête d'Herbe était là en premier.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Just how long have you been waiting?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mais combien de temps tu as attendu ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh? For a little bit.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh ? Juste un peu.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: No way...!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est pas possible... !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well to be fair, I've run the Grand Krys'kajo before.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon, pour être franc, j'avais déjà fait le \v[area.tree-dng.name] auparavant.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: WHAT?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: QUOI ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Obviously. This is not my first CrossWorlds character.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bien entendu. Ce n'est pas mon premier personnage dans CrossWorlds.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Then...\. then why didn't you say anything?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Alors...\. pourquoi tu nous as rien dit ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You dragged me into the whole thing.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Parce que c'est vous qui m'avez attiré dans cette histoire.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I figured you'd be aware that I'm an advanced player.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je pensais que vous étiez au courant que j'étais un joueur assez expérimenté.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well... you lost to Lea several times in the duels so I thought you were all talk.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Pas vraiment... Tu as perdu plusieurs fois contre Lea dans les duels, donc je pensais que tu étais juste prétentieux.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: EXCUSE ME, DIDN"T YOU SEE HOW MUCH DAMAGE SHE DOES?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: EXCUSE-MOI, TU N'AS PAS VU COMBIEN DE DÉGÂTS ELLE FAISAIT ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: No, that's just because Lea is exceptionally skilled! That's all!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Non, c'est juste parce que Lea est extrêmement talentueuse ! C'est tout !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Lea!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Lea !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I didn't think an advanced player would seek duels with new players like Lea.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je ne pensais pas qu'un joueur avancé chercherait à faire des duels avec des nouvelles joueuses comme Lea.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well, there aren't too many Spheromancers to be found with matching level.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon, c'est qu'il n'y a pas beaucoup de Spheromancers avec un niveau similaire.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, here we are!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: En tout cas, nous y sommes !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: The \c[3]very top of the Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: \c[3]Tout en haut du \v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: The final major temple completed!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Le dernier temple majeur terminé !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oui, and all we had to do is beat an ape and gigantic whale in a tree.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, et tout ce qu'on a eu à faire, c'est frapper un singe et une baleine géante dans un arbre.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Also...\. suddenly space?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et maintenant...\. soudainement on est dans l'espace ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Are we really that high up?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: On est vraiment si haut ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It is just an illusion of course. We Seekers would not survive long in space without oxygen.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est juste une illusion bien entendu. Nous les \v[lore.title.seeker]s ne survivrions pas longtemps dans l'espace.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Uhm...\. do we even need to breathe as avatars?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Heu...\. est-ce qu'on a besoin de respirer en tant qu'avatars ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I'm talking In-game lore.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je parle de l'histoire du jeu.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh...\. right.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh...\. c'est vrai.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Let's proceed!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon, continuons notre route !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Your journey has brought you 
to many different places.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Votre voyage vous a mené
vers différents lieux.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
From freezing mountains,
over scorching deserts,
to the unforgiving wilderness.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Depuis les montagnes gelées
aux déserts brulants
vers l'impitoyable nature sauvage.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Now you stand victorious,
high above the ground.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Maintenant vous vous trouvez victorieux,
haut dans le ciel.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
You mastered all 4 elements,
withstood all the trials.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Vous avez maitrisé les 4 éléments.
surmonté toutes les épreuves.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Vous, le voyageur.
L'émissaire du changement.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Your accomplishments shall
be acknowledged.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Vos accomplissements
méritent une récompense.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Take this Shade 
to open the path further to the east.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Prenez ce Symbole
pour ouvrir le chemin plus à l'est.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: \v[item.410.name]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: \v[item.410.name]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Your resourcefulness is apparent 
and deserves to be further rewarded.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Votre talent est apparent
et mérite une autre récompense.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
I shall add to your strength
to prepare you for challenges to come.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Puis-je ajouter à votre force
pour vous préparer pour les épreuves futures.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: SP Bar
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Barre de SP

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Que chacun de vos pas
dessine le chemin de votre croissance.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Good morning, Lea.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bonjour, Lea !
... Salut.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: So...\. did you see anything new in your dreams?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Donc...\. Est-ce que tu as vu quelque chose de nouveau dans tes rêves ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well...\. anything you think you will be able to communicate?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Peut-être quelque chose...\. que tu penses pouvoir réussir à m'expliquer ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Sorry.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Désolé.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It is fine, Lea. I suppose they are just dreams in the end.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est pas grave, Lea. Nous ne devons pas oublier que ce sont juste des rêves au final.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: They can be confusing.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ils peuvent être confus.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, time to enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: En tout cas, il est temps d'entrer dans la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It is located to the \c[3]east of Autumn's Fall\c[0], remember?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Il se trouve à l'\c[3]est de \v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0], tu te souviens ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: And once we are there...\. well....\.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et une fois qu'on sera là-bas...\. eh bien...\.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I suppose we just have to walk around until you recognize the places from your dreams.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Nous devrions juste nous balader jusqu'à que tu reconnaisses les endroits de tes rêves.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: If I remember correctly you first have to solve a \c[3]main story quest\c[0] in order to access the whole location.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Si je me souviens bien, il faut d'abord résoudre une \c[3]quête principale\c[0] pour pouvoir accéder à l'intégralité de la région.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: So it is probably a good idea to focus on that first.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Donc c'est probablement mieux de se concentrer là-dessus.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh yes... one last thing.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ah oui... encore une chose.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It is fine to explore the area with your friends.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Il n'y a pas de problème pour explorer la région avec tes amis.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: But once we get close to uncovering that hidden location, we should make sure we are alone.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mais une fois que l'on sera proche de cet endroit caché, nous devrions nous assurer que l'on soit seuls.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I expect none of this is really supposed to be...\. official.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je suppose que rien de ceci n'est censé être...\. officiel.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Lea!? You are here?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Lea ?! Tu es là aussi ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh! What a coincidence. I guess you just logged in, didn't you?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh ! Quelle coïncidence. Je devine que tu viens juste de te connecter, c'est ça ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Emilie already told me how you did the temple together with Apollo.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Emilie m'a déjà raconté comment vous avez fait le temple avec Apollo.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: That really must have been interesting.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ça devait vraiment être intéressant.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Ah, don't worry about me.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ah, ne t'inquiète pas pour moi.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I just did the dungeon at my own pace. It was nice for a change.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: J'ai juste fait le donjon à mon propre rythme. C'était agréable pour changer.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, I just collected the \c[3]Star Shade\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: En tout cas, je viens juste de récupérer le \c[3]Symbole d'Étoile\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: So if you want me to tag along in Sapphire Ridge, just tell me!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Donc si tu veux, on peut aller ensemble à la \v[area.forest.name] !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Dacodac !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: By the way...\. This place is quite amazing, isn't it?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: D'ailleurs...\. Cet endroit est assez fascinant, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: A view like this... just like a clear sky at night.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Une vue comme celle-là... comme la nuit avec un ciel clair.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It has always impressed me.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ça m'a toujours impressionné.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: A boundless sea of stars...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Un océan sans fin d'étoiles...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
When you see it, 
you start to realize...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
Quand on le voit,
on finit par comprendre...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
... just how insignificant 
we are to this world.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text:
... à quel point on est tous
insignifiant aux yeux de ce monde.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig:
By the way...\.
I know a good sign for this.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: D'ailleurs...\.Je connais un bon signe pour ça.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Wait...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Attends...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Hm?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Hm ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: H-Hey!\. I know that one!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: H-Hé !\. Je le connais celui-là !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: That's the sign for \c[3]Stars\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est le signe pour les \c[3]Étoiles\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: How come you know this? Did somebody teach it to you?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Comment ça se fait que tu saches ça ? Est-ce que quelqu'un te l'a appris ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I never knew you actually learned sign language before.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je ne savais pas que tu avais appris le langage des signes auparavant.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.note: since he did, and he's in the embarassed state, this sentence actually makes sense, and 'auparavent' is the right word.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh!\. That reminds me...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh !\. À propos...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You should drop by the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] now that you're online.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tu devrais passer au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] maintenant que tu es en ligne.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: We've got some great news for you!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: On a une bonne nouvelle pour toi !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I'll go ahead, let's meet over there!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je vais partir devant, on se voit là-bas !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: See you!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: À plus tard !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: That was interesting...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Intéressant...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: How do you know that sign, Lea?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Comment tu connais ce signe, Lea ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Or rather...\. do you remember who taught it to you?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Où plutôt...\. est-ce que tu te souviens de qui te l'a appris ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I see... well then.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je vois...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well, we could enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] now...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon, on peut entrer à la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0] maintenant...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: But I suppose you might as well go to your \c[3]guild first\c[0] and listen to their news.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mais je pense qu'on peut commencer par aller prendre des \c[3]nouvelles de ta guilde\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Visit your guild at \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] and listen to their news.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Visitez votre guilde au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] et écoutez leurs nouvelles.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Finally the Star Shade.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Enfin le Symbole d'Étoile.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Now the end game begins!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Maintenant, la phase finale commence !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Why?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Because you can learn all the \c[3]level 3 combat arts\c[0] now.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Parce que maintenant tu peux apprendre tous les \c[3]Arts de combats niveau 3\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Duels are now especially interesting.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Les duels vont devenir vraiment intéressants.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Which reminds me...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ce qui me fait rappeler...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Are you serious?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: T'es sérieux ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Do you want to duel with Lea? Right now?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tu veux déjà faire un duel avec Lea ? Tout de suite ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well...\. Now certainly isn't the best time.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon...\. Maintenant ce n'est pas encore le bon moment pour faire ça.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: We both need time to prepare, get familiar with all the new skills.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Il nous faut un peu de temps à nous deux pour nous préparer, et découvrir toutes nos nouvelles compétences.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oui, also we played for a whole lot at once, didn't we?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, et sinon on a tous joué pendant un bon moment, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It's about time to log off.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Il est temps pour moi de me déconnecter.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: That...\. is a good point, too.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est...\. aussi un bon argument.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, didn't expect to say this but it was pretty fun racing with you.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: En tout cas, je ne m'attendais pas à dire ça, mais cette course avec toi m'a vraiment fait plaisir.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You should join our party again some time, Grasshead.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tu devrais rejoindre notre groupe un jour, Tête d'Herbe.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: That's Apollo to you!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est Apollo, non mais !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ... I'll think about it.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... J'y penserais.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oui, oui...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, oui...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, I'll logout now. See you around.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: En tout cas, je vais me déconnecter maintenant. À plus.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Yes, me too.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, moi aussi.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Until then, Spheromancer Lea and Pentafist Emilie!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: À plus, Spheromancer Lea et Pentafist Emilie !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Mon Dieu, what a mouthful.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mon Dieu, quel blablateur.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Alright, looks like we are finally ready!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bon, donc on est enfin prêt !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Now that we collected the \c[3]Star Shade\c[0], we can enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Maintenant que l'on a collecté le \c[3]Symbole d'Étoile\c[0], on peut finalement entrer à là \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Anyway, we have played for a pretty long time again.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Sinon, ça fait déjà depuis un moment qu'on joue.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Should we call it a day as well?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Est-ce que nous aussi, il faut s'arrêter là pour aujourd'hui ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Alright.\. Good night, Lea.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bien.\. Bonne nuit, Lea.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Bye.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Bye.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Back to the \c[3]Entrance\c[0]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Retour vers \c[3]Entrée\c[0]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I'M IN SPACE!! LITERALLY SPACE!!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: JE SUIS DANS L'ESPACE !! LITTÉRALEMENT !!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: The floor is TRANSPARENT! There is NO FENCE!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Le sol est TRANSPARENT ! Il n'y a PAS DE BARRIÈRE !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: WHAT IS THIS?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: QU'EST-CE QUE C'EST ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: C-Calm down!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: D-Du calme !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: They made me go HIGHER up than ANYONE has any RIGHT to be!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ils m'ont fait aller ENCORE PLUS HAUT, là ou PERSONNE n'aurait le DROIT d'aller !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Is this on purpose?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Est-ce qu'ils font ça volontairement ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Do they want to scar me for life?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Est-ce qu'ils veulent me traumatiser pendant le reste de ma vie ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You're gonna be fine!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Tout ira bien !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: E'nel really is one badass goddess. Look at that flaming blade.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: E'nel est vraiment une déesse trop géniale. Hé mec, regarde son épée de feu !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Yeah... she's so friggin hot.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ouais... Elle est trop chaude.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Huh?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Hein ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I-I mean her sword! It's all flames! Must be really hot, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: J-Je veux dire son épée ! Elle est en feu ! Ça doit être vraiment chaud, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Right...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: OK...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Outer Space.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: L'espace.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Countless stars.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Les innombrables étoiles.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: The absolute silence of the vacuum.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Le silence absolu du vide.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: How?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Comment ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well...\. I suppose the last one doesn't apply.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui bon, OK...\. Le dernier point ne semble peut-être pas s'appliquer.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I bet this god has a number of tricks up his sleeve!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je parie que ce dieu a quelques tours dans son sac !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...Because he's holding cards?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... Parce qu'il tient des cartes dans ses mains ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: ...Yes.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: ... Oui.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Now I wonder what card games the Ancients used to play.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Maintenant je me demande à quels jeux de cartes les Anciens jouaient.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Phew... that boss was quite something, wasn't it?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Pfiou... Ce boss, c'était quelque chose, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh yeah! That ape was raging like crazy at end!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh yeah ! Ce singe était vraiment enragé à la fin, oh !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oh... did you guys defeat the whale first?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oh... vous avez commencé par battre la baleine ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Yeah... isn't that pretty much the only way?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ouais... Ce n'est pas un peu le seul moyen ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: No, you can defeat the ape first as well.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Non, tu peux battre le singe en premier aussi.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: You just need to knock it off the whale in the later rounds, using those wave teleport bubbles.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Il faut juste l'éjecter de la baleine dans les derniers rounds, en utilisant ces bulles d'ondes de téléportation.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Whoa, I didn't even notice! I was just 100% focused on punching that whale...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ouah, cool, je l'avais même pas remarqué ! J'étais juste 100 % concentré pour boxer cette baleine...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: And? Did you recognize any constellations yet?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et ? Tu reconnais des constellations là ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Not really... do you think the celestial sphere is even the same?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Non, pas vraiment... tu penses que l'hémisphère est le même ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I heard this place isn't too far from our planet, so it should be about the same.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: J'ai cru comprendre que cet endroit n'est pas très loin de notre planète, donc ça devrait être pareil.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well...\. unless all of this is just simulated, which it probably is.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui...\. sauf si tout est juste simulé, ce qui est probable.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Right...\. They like to mess with things like this to keep their artistic freedom.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui...\. Ils aiment bien changer des choses comme ça pour garder leur liberté artistique.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I gotta admit...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je dois admettre...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I was surprised when I found out they would give us two elements so close to each other.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: J'ai été surpris quand j'ai découvert qu'ils nous donneraient deux éléments dans un intervalle aussi court.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Surprised?\. Don't you mean... \c[3]shocked\c[0]?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Surpris ?\. Tu veux dire...  \c[3]choqué\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Dude, that pun is overused.\. Come up with something better.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mec, cette blague est tellement usée.\. Essaye de trouver mieux.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I, uh...\. I can't think of anything. Sorry.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je, euh...\. je n'arrive pas à trouver mieux. Désolé.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It's fine, I'll... \c[3]wave\c[0] this off.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'est bon, je... vais pas en faire des \c[3]vagues\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Sergiy
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Sergiy

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: A whale.\. A huge whale.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Une baleine.\. Une baleine géante.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: So a hover board wasn't quite crazy enough.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Et un singe qui vole sur un nuage. Parce qu'un Hoverboard, c'était pas assez.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.note: de/en mix. de: Et un singe qui vole sur un nuage.  Note that it is an echo to maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-middle.json/entities/35/settings/npcStates/0/event/7/message

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: No, they had to put the ape on a whale!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mais ça suffisait pas ! Non ! Il fallait que le singe chevauche la baleine !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Oui, that was quite... strange.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Oui, c'était assez... étrange.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Dodging that lightning and whale jump was pretty intense.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Éviter ces éclairs et ces sauts de baleines était assez intense.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: I'll still take it over a bunch of bugs any day!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Mais je préfère toujours ça à un tas d'insectes !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: It was an honorable challenge, perfectly fit for a Spheromancer!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: C'était un challenge honorable, parfait pour un Spheromancer !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Wait...\. which part of it being a giant whale makes it honorable!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Attends... En quoi le fait que ça soit une baleine géante le rend honorable ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Well, it's...\. huge...\. and majestic.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Ben, c'est...\. énorme...\. et majestueux.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.orig: Can't deny that.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-space.json/ent.text: Je ne peux pas le nier.
